mapper.select: SELECT company_no, member_no, company_name, company_hp, ceo_name, company_type, business_type_code, company_address_detail, company_site, listing_status, company_est, company_sales FROM company WHERE company_no = #{company_no}
SELECT schedule_no, schedule_title, company_no, schedule_memo, schedule_start, schedule_end FROM company_schedule
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_schedule(schedule_title, schedule_start, schedule_end, schedule_memo, company_no) VALUES(#{schedule_title}, #{schedule_start}, #{schedule_end}, #{schedule_memo}, #{company_no})
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX(f SYS_C007645) INDEX_DESC(e SYS_C007729) */ e.jobfairentry_no, e.company_no, e.jobfair_no, e.jobfairentry_status, f.jobfair_title, f.jobfair_place, f.jobfair_sdate, f.jobfair_edate FROM job_fair f, job_fair_entry e WHERE e.company_no = #{company_no} AND f.jobfair_no = e.jobfair_no

SELECT posting_no, posting_title, posting_sdate, posting_edate, isshow FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(job_posting SYS_C007632) */ rownum r, posting_no, posting_title, posting_sdate, posting_edate, isshow FROM JOB_POSTING WHERE rownum <= #{currentPageNo} * #{recordsPerPage} AND company_no = #{company_no}) WHERE r > (#{currentPageNo}-1) * #{recordsPerPage}

SELECT status_no, member_no, posting_no, first_pass, final_pass, interview_date, resume_title, resume_no FROM(SELECT /*+ INDEX(a SYS_C007741) INDEX_DESC(r SYS_C007616) */ rownum as w, a.status_no as status_no, a.member_no as member_no, a.posting_no as posting_no, a.first_pass as first_pass, a.final_pass as final_pass, a.interview_date as interview_date, r.resume_title as resume_title, r.resume_no as resume_no FROM application_status a INNER JOIN resume r ON a.resume_no = r.resume_no WHERE rownum <= #{currentPageNo} * #{recordsPerPage} AND a.posting_no IN ( SELECT DISTINCT(posting_no) FROM job_posting WHERE company_no = #{company_no})) WHERE w > (#{currentPageNo}-1) * #{recordsPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(r.resume_no) FROM application_status a, resume r WHERE a.resume_no = r.resume_no AND a.posting_no IN ( SELECT DISTINCT(posting_no) FROM job_posting WHERE company_no = #{company_no})
